LanguageData.injuryHealingPoints_tip: How much health is healed on a random injury(default 5)
LanguageData.injuryHealingCost_tip: How much DragonBlood it costs to heal an injury(default 0.02)
LanguageData.thresholdToBeConsideredDamaged_tip: When is a body part considered damaged? (starts DragonBlood healing)(default 0.5)
LanguageData.thresholdToBeConsideredHealed_tip: When is a body part considered healed? (stops DragonBlood healing)(default 1)
LanguageData.dragonBloodGainFromDragonRage_tip: On each final DragonRage hit, gain how much DragonBlood?(default 0.1)
